Then, I would like you to explain the purpose and functionality of this code in simple, plain language that would be understandable to someone without a programming background. Focus on explaining the key steps and logic, and avoid getting too bogged down in minor syntactical details. Think through how you can break down the explanation into clear, easy to follow steps. Use analogies to familiar concepts where appropriate to make the explanation more relatable and intuitive. Provide your explanation inside tags. My preferred language is: {{LANGUAGE}}
